means: 未被预定地，无保留地，完全地

sentence.Network_en: We apologise unreservedly for any imputation of incorrect behaviour by Mr Taylor.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们为泰勒先生有关不当行为的非难表示诚挚道歉。

sentence.Network_en: We apologize unreservedly for any offence we have caused.
sentence.Network_cn: 若有得罪，我们深表歉意。

sentence.Network_en: He placed unreservedly all the data he has collected at my disposal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把他搜集到的全部数据毫无保留地让我使用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unreserved 坦白的 unreservedly 不客气地 unresponsive 无答复的.
1. variabilityunreservedly adv. 毫无保留地，不客气地n.
absurlutly 这个词是什么意思?_百度知道 ... completely 绝对地; 完全地: unreservedly;unconditionally 无保留地; 无条件地.
满_互动百科 ... 满口是血【 pure】 满口谎言【 unreservedly】 满脸生花【 smiling all over】.

list.abs: He knew he should not bother but unreservedly revel in the sensations she transmitted., 他知道他应该不打扰 , 但毫无保留地酷爱她传输的感觉.
百度词典搜索_保留 ... have reservations; 持保留意见 agree unreservedly;agree without reservation 无保留地同意.
apologizeapologize unreservedly 坦诚地道歉apologize for 为某道歉
I can unreservedly recommend this restaurant !, 我毫无保留地推荐这家餐馆!

entry.def: An unreserved opinion or statement is one that expresses a feeling or opinion completely and without any doubts.

example.ex: Charles displays unreserved admiration for his grandfather...
example.tran: 查尔斯从不掩饰他对祖父的景仰。

example.ex: Jones' lawyers are seeking an unreserved apology from the newspaper.
example.tran: 琼斯的律师要求报纸坦诚道歉。

auth_sentence.content: In London the British government condemned the leak unreservedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: In London the British government condemned the leak unreservedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In London the British government condemned the leak unreservedly.

auth_sentence.content: We apologise unreservedly to the Duke and the Duchess.
auth_sentence.res_content: We apologise unreservedly to the Duke and the Duchess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We apologise unreservedly to the Duke and the Duchess.

means.word_mean: 无限制地;无条件地;充分地

sentences.en: He placed unreservedly all the data he has collected at my disposal.
sentences.cn: 他把他搜集到的全部数据毫无保留地让我使用。
